sentence.text: Alazami syndrome (AS) (negative regulation of epithelial cell proliferation# 615071) is an autosomal recessive microcephalic primordial dwarfism (PD) with recognizable facial features and severe intellectual disability due to depletion or loss of function variants in RNA processing.

entity.text: negative regulation of epithelial cell proliferation

sentence.text: By comparing these two additional cases with those previously reported, we strengthen the key features of AS: severe growth restriction, severe intellectual disability and some distinguishing facial features such as broad nose, malar hypoplasia, wide mouth, full lips and abnormally negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated teeth.
